channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Useful commands
item.description: Useful commands See a list of addresses and symbols defined in the linux kernel head /proc/kallsyms See a specific address for a symbol cat /proc/kallsyms | grep commit_creds View kernel modules: cat /proc/modules To use function names for breakpoints you can do the following in gdb: add-symbol-file <driver-path> <base-address> See if SMEP is enabled from inside of the machine (requires root)(extend terminal width): cat /proc/cpuinfo | grep smep Enable SMEP in qemu
